pullrequest.title: First part of MassMatrix3 class, mostly accessors and modifiers

content.raw:
I just ran lcov on my machine, and found my way to the `MassMatrix3.hh` description, then noticed a link at the top for functions (at `build/coverage/math/MassMatrix3.hh.func.html`). This shows the mangled function names. ![MassMatrix3d_function_coverage.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/dg5enz/images/3355472338-MassMatrix3d_function_coverage.png)

I demangled two of these, which are both destructors, but is marked as called, while the other is uncalled:

~~~
$ c++filt
_ZN8ignition4math11MassMatrix3IdED0Ev
ignition::math::MassMatrix3<double>::~MassMatrix3()
_ZN8ignition4math11MassMatrix3IdED2Ev
ignition::math::MassMatrix3<double>::~MassMatrix3()
~~~

I'm confused but am assuming it is a quirk of lcov.
content.html:
I just ran lcov on my machine, and found my way to the MassMatrix3.hh description, then noticed a link at the top for functions (at build/coverage/math/MassMatrix3.hh.func.html). This shows the mangled function names.

I demangled two of these, which are both destructors, but is marked as called, while the other is uncalled:

$ c++filt
_ZN8ignition4math11MassMatrix3IdED0Ev
ignition::math::MassMatrix3<double>::~MassMatrix3()
_ZN8ignition4math11MassMatrix3IdED2Ev
ignition::math::MassMatrix3<double>::~MassMatrix3()

I'm confused but am assuming it is a quirk of lcov.
